de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.session.base.simple

Class DefaultSessionAttributes

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.session.base.simple.DefaultSessionAttributes
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.attribute.Attributed, SessionAttributes

    public class DefaultSessionAttributes
extends Object
implements SessionAttributes
    Default attributes for a TNC(C/S) session.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DefaultSessionAttributes

        public DefaultSessionAttributes(TcgProtocolBindingIdentifier tnccsProtocol)
        Creates the default session attributes with a given protocol type and version. The default preferred language is set to english and the maximum message round trips are set to unknown.
        Parameters:
        tnccsProtocol - the IF-TNCCS protocol identifier

      • DefaultSessionAttributes

        public DefaultSessionAttributes(TcgProtocolBindingIdentifier tnccsProtocol,
                        String preferredLanguage)
        Creates the default session attributes with a given attribute values.
        Parameters:
        tnccsProtocol - the IF-TNCCS protocol identifier
        preferredLanguage - the preferred human readable language

      • setCurrentRoundTrips

        public void setCurrentRoundTrips(long roundtrips)
        Description copied from interface: SessionAttributes
        Sets the current message round trip count of the session. If the round trips exceed the maximum value of long the current round trips will be set to zero.
        Specified by:
        setCurrentRoundTrips in interface SessionAttributes
        Parameters:
        roundtrips - the current round trips
